text: Luis Antonio Arevalo Espadas (born September 10, 1982 in Miguelturra) is a swimmer from Spain. He is also a student. He has a disability: He is blind and is an S13/SB13/SM13/B3 type swimmer. He raced at the 2000 Summer Paralympics. He came in third in 4 x 100 meter relay 49 Points swimming race. He raced at the 2004 Summer Paralympics. He raced at the 2008 Summer Paralympics. == References == Category:Spanish swimmers Category:Living people Category:1982 births Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for Spain Category:Castile-La Mancha Category:2000 Summer Paralympics Category:2004 Summer Paralympics Category:2008 Summer Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B3
title: Luis Antonio Arevalo Espadas
